name: CVE-2022-21794
description: Improper authentication in BIOS firmware for some Intel(R) NUC Boards, Intel(R) NUC Business, Intel(R) NUC Enthusiast, Intel(R) NUC Kits before version HN0067 may allow a privileged user to potentially enable escalation of privilege via local access.
pattern: [((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:nuc_kit_nuc8i7hnk_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:intel:nuc_kit_nuc8i7hnk:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:nuc_kit_nuc8i7hvk_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:intel:nuc_kit_nuc8i7hvk:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:nuc_8_enthusiast_nuc8i7hvkva_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:intel:nuc_8_enthusiast_nuc8i7hvkva:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:nuc_8_enthusiast_nuc8i7hvkvaw_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:intel:nuc_8_enthusiast_nuc8i7hvkvaw:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:intel:nuc_8_business_nuc8i7hnkqc_firmware:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:intel:nuc_8_business_nuc8i7hnkqc:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*'))]
